homeSection.title: J. Gaik Page
homeSection.subtitle: Hi, I'm Jacob and this is a home page for my web projects portfolio. Nice to meet You.

aboutMeSection.title: About me
aboutMeSection.introduction:
I’m a software engineer with a strong focus on front-end development, backed by a foundation in back-end programming. My journey into coding began with a passion for creating tools that automate and improve daily tasks. I enjoy the freedom that programming offers, where design and implementation possibilities are virtually limitless.
Beyond work, I’m passionate about personal growth. I enjoy calisthenics, acrobatics, and learning Japanese, as well as experimenting in the kitchen. My approach to life is rooted in organization and simplicity: breaking tasks into manageable chunks and prioritizing not over-complicated solutions. I focus on completing 80% of a task quickly to achieve the result fast and then refine it over time.
aboutMeSection.resumeInfo: Curious about my background and experience? View my resume with an overview of my education and work history.
